name: subsection name
summary: main points of the subsection in one or two sentences

paragraphs.text: this is a paragraph in the subsection. Refer to other work and experiments as much as possible. To cite, always use the syntax ((citation needed: <put meaningful keywords here to find relevant studies on semantic scholar>)). to refer to experiments and results, always use the syntax ((result needed: <put a short description of the required experiment here>)). Refer to other work and experiments as much as possible using our special syntax.
